New Records: Domantas Sabonis achieved a career-high 28 rebounds.
Domantas Sabonis set the NBA season-high for rebounds in a game with 28.
Key Match Events: Domantas Sabonis had 23 points and a career-high 28 rebounds.
DeMar DeRozan added 24 points and nine assists.
Malik Monk finished with 22 points and eight assists.
Jaylen Brown led the Celtics with 28 points.
Kristaps Porzingis added 22 points and 10 rebounds.
Jayson Tatum had 15 points and 12 rebounds.
The game was tied at 76 after three quarters.
Sacramento opened the fourth quarter on a 24-9 run to take a 100-85 lead with 6:03 to play.
Sacramento outscored Boston 38-21 in the final period.
Tatum’s eight turnovers are the most by a Celtics player this season.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The victory extended Sacramento's season-high win streak to six games.
It was Sabonis’ 33rd double-double of the season and 24th game of his career with 20 or more rebounds.
Boston has lost two of its last three games.
Kings outscored Boston 48-40 in the paint and held a 56-43 rebounding edge.
Kings did it without De’Aaron Fox, who missed his third straight game with a bruised glute.
Boston dropped to 13-7 at TD Garden this season.
